summary: The diff implements a comprehensive sunset theme replacement across frontend files. REQ-37 (index.css), REQ-38 (tailwind.config.js), REQ-39 (all page/component files), and REQ-40 (LoadingScreen3D.tsx) are addressed. However, tailwind.config.js and LoadingScreen3D.tsx were listed as omitted files due to limits, so their content cannot be verified directly. Several REQ-39 components are visible and correctly updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/tailwind.config.js to replace neon-themed color tokens with sunset palette tokens and update pulse-glow keyframe animation colors.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/tailwind.config.js appears in the list of modified files but was omitted from the diff due to size limits. Its content cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update LoadingScreen3D.tsx overlay UI and Three.js scene (sky gradient, building colors, vehicle/light colors) to use sunset palette.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen3D.tsx appears in the list of modified files but was omitted from the diff due to size limits. Its content cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply sunset theme to admin sub-components AdminWhitelistManager.tsx and OrderManager.tsx.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminWhitelistManager.tsx and OrderManager.tsx are not shown in the diff summary. They are listed as required components in REQ-39 but their modification cannot be confirmed from the available diff.
